text:
apr_socket_create calls SetHandleInformation for Windows with Unicode file
systems  (that is WinNT and WinCE but not Win9x) with an alternative
implementation for Windows 9x.  SetHandleInformation is not supported on WinCE,
but the Win 9x code path seems to work fine if enabled (testsockets would pass).
 The attached patch file modifes the #if's so the Win9x code path is also used
for WinCE.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18502
Uses Win9x code path for WinCE instead of SetHandleInfo...
Mass reassign the 44 open apr-bugs to apr bug list
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text: It compiles and builds fine on VS C++ 6.0
creator: davi@apache.org
